scripts.start: npm run lite" npm run gulpsass" npm run gulpscript"
scripts.sassdoc: ./node_modules/.bin/sassdoc resources/assets/sass/ sassdoc --config=.sassdocrc && echo 'Documentation successfully generated in sassdoc/index.html'
scripts.sassdoc-deploy-first-time: git add sassdoc && git commit -m 'Compile SassDoc' --allow-empty && git subtree push --prefix sassdoc origin gh-pages && echo 'Documentation successfully deployed to http://filipveschool.github.io/angular2gulpsassdefinitieveresume/'
scripts.sassdoc-deploy: git add sassdoc && git commit -m 'Compile SassDoc' --allow-empty && git push origin :gh-pages && git subtree push --prefix sassdoc origin gh-pages && echo 'Documentation successfully deployed to http://filipveschool.github.io/angular2gulpsassdefinitieveresume/'
